action.des: Jeff Larish remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Ramon Santiago replaces shortstop Adam Everett, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Pitcher Change: Juan Rincon replaces Bobby Seay.

atbat.des: Van Pope pops out to first baseman Miguel Cabrera in foul territory.
Brian McCann singles on a fly ball to left fielder Carlos Guillen.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Matt Young replaces Brian McCann.

atbat.des: Matt Diaz grounds out, second baseman Justin Henry to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Matt Young to 2nd.
Omar Infante flies out to right fielder Josh Anderson.

action.des: Matt Young remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Javier Guzman replaces shortstop Omar Infante, batting 6th, playing shortstop.
Pitcher Change: Boone Logan replaces Jeff Bennett.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson singles on a line drive to center fielder Gregor Blanco.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Deik Scram replaces Curtis Granderson.

atbat.des: Justin Henry grounds into double play, second baseman Martin Prado to shortstop Javier Guzman to first baseman Greg Norton. Deik Scram out at 2nd.
Magglio Ordonez grounds out, third baseman Van Pope to first baseman Greg Norton.
